name: Kingdom Keno - Video Keno Casino Game
name_original: Kingdom Keno - Video Keno Casino Game
description:
Kingdom Keno is the latest casino game from Gold Coin Kingdom, bringing with it a fun and easy to play Keno experience.

Enjoy all your favorite keno betting and use any denomination you want! Bet $1 all the way down to $0.01 to keep the keno fun going all night?

Realistic casino background music will make you feel like you're right there!
